name: mission-control
description: Mission Control - Full Stack Application with React Frontend and Node.js Backend

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --workspace=mission-control-backend install && npm --workspace=mission-control-frontend install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf mission-control-backend/node_modules && rm -rf mission-control-frontend/node_modules
scripts.test: npm --workspace=mission-control-backend run test && npm --workspace=mission-control-frontend run test
scripts.lint: npm --workspace=mission-control-backend run lint && npm --workspace=mission-control-frontend run lint
scripts.format: npm --workspace=mission-control-backend run format && npm --workspace=mission-control-frontend run format

author: Mission Control Team
